column3: JPja
column4: USen

column3:
うーむ…
まだ危険は去っちゃいませんね？
column4:
Something tells me...we aren't quite out
of danger yet...

column3:
うーむ…
まだ魔物の気配が残ってますけど
column4:
I don't see any more monsters, but... 
I can feel their eyes on me.

column3: うーむ…あちこちが痛い…
column4:
Huh? Where am I sore?
...
...Everywhere...

column3: うーむ…成す術なし！
column4: Oh, uh... There was nothing I could do!

column3:
来るぞ来るぞ！
ガーディアンが来るぞー！わー！
column4:
It's coming! A Guardian is coming!
Run for your lives!

column3:
うーむ…進むべきか戻るべきか
悩める男 ダエトール…
悩むべきか悩まぬべきか
うーむ悩ましい…
column4:
Hmm... Should I keep going, or should I
turn back? A troubling dilemma...

But is it even worth being troubled by?
Now that's troubling...

column3:
今日も悩むダエトール…
進むべきか戻るべきか…
column4:
My next big life decision... Should I keep
moving forward, or should I turn back?

column3:
うーむ…熱さに耐えるか退くか
悩める男 ダエトール…
熱による汗と冷や汗の両方タラタラです
column4:
Hmm... Should I try to withstand the
heat, or should I not even bother?
A troubling dilemma...
No matter the temperature of the sweat,
I'm going to be soaked either way.

column3:
今日も悩むダエトール…
熱さに耐えるべきか退くか…
column4:
My next big life decision... 
Can I take the heat, or should I
get out of the kitchen?

column3:
うーむ…ここで休むか休まず行くか
悩める男 ダエトール…
あのね…
休んでるんじゃない悩んでるんだ
column4:
Hmm... Should I rest here, or should I
try to find a better spot?
A troubling dilemma...
It's not like I'd be able to get any rest
right now, anyway... Certainly not with
all these troubles on my mind.

column3:
今日も悩むダエトール…
休むべきか行くべきか…
column4:
My next big life decision... To rest,
or not to rest?

column3:
うーむ…火山に挑むか挑まぬか
悩める男 ダエトール…
もし見物客が大勢いれば
調子に乗って挑んじゃうんだろうけどね
column4:
Hmm... Should I try to reach the volcano
or take the easy way out and just not
make the trip? A troubling dilemma...
If there are a lot of tourists hanging
around up there...there could be
some good selling to be had.

column3:
今日も悩むダエトール…
火山に挑むべきか挑まぬか…
column4:
My next big life decision...
To challenge the volcano, or to simply...
not?

column3:
うーむ…地図を見ようか勘で行こうか
悩める男 ダエトール…
そうは言っても火山道…
迷わず地図を見て迷わないようにしないとね！
column4:
Hmm... Should I check my map, or
should I go by intuition like the original
trailblazers? A troubling dilemma...
Now that I think about it, this is a
volcanic road. I'd better check my map.

column3:
今日も悩むダエトール…
火山道を地図を見て進むべきか勘で行くか…
column4:
My next big life decision...
Should I follow my instincts or follow
my map?

column3: どうするべきか…
column4: Hmm... What should I do?

column3: これでいいのか…
column4: Will I be OK like this?

column3: これでよかったのか…
column4: Was that the right choice?

column3: 寝るべきか…
column4: Should I get some sleep?

column3: 旅は中止か…
column4: Maybe I should go home.

column3:
こんな世の中だから悩みも多くてね
キリがないから ちょっと休憩してるんだ
column4:
There are so many troubling things in a
bleak world such as this. They only seem
to cease when I take a break.

column3:
雨だれの音を聴いているんだ
ジャマしないでくれるかな
column4:
Listening to falling rain is the only thing
in this world that isn't troubling to me.
Could you come back when it's over?

column3:
悩める男 ダエトール
雨が似合う男 ダエトール
どっちが モテるかな
column4:
A man whose brooding visage weighs
heavy with countless troubled thoughts...
or a man who looks dashing in the rain...
I wonder which one the ladies prefer.

column3:
うーむ…冒険を続けるべきか諦めるべきか
悩める男 ダエトール…
1時間ほど休憩するっていう第三の選択肢も
あるにはあるんですけどね
column4:
Hmm... Should I continue my adventure
or quit while I'm ahead? 
A troubling dilemma...
But I guess there is a secret third option.
I could take an hour-long nap.

column3:
今日も悩むダエトール…
冒険を続けるべきか諦めるべきか…
column4:
My next big life decision...
To continue my adventure, or to
quit? Or to take a nap...

column3:
うーむ…魔物に堂々と挑むか スタコラ逃げるか
悩める男 ダエトール…
そうだ！堂々と逃げればいいのだ！
column4:
Hmm... Should I bravely face these
monsters, or should I run away as fast as
I can? A troubling dilemma...
I shall run away as fast as I can.
But I shall do so bravely!

column3:
今日も悩むダエトール…
魔物と戦うべきか逃げるべきか…
column4:
My next big life decision...
To boldly fight, or to boldly run?

column3:
うーむ…燃えず薬を入手できるか できないか
悩める男 ダエトール…
…じつは燃えず薬が手に入らなくても
ヒケシトカゲと魔物素材で ごにょごにょっと…
column4:
Hmm... Can I wrangle myself a
fireproof elixir? A troubling dilemma...

Even if I can't get a fireproof elixir,
I guess I could always use a
fireproof lizard and monster parts to...

column3:
今日も悩むダエトール…
燃えず薬を入手できるか できないか…
column4:
My next big life question...
Is a fireproof elixir within my grasp?!

column3:
うーむ…馬で進むか歩いてゆくか 
悩める男 ダエトール…
自分の足でゆくとしても
さて右足から出すか左からか…なんちゃって
column4:
Hmm... Should I travel by horseback or
continue on foot? A troubling dilemma...

Moreover, if I continue on foot, do I start
with my left foot or my right foot?
A less troubling dilemma...

column3:
今日も悩むダエトール…
馬で進むか歩いて進むか…
column4:
My next big life decision... To save
the horse, or to save my feet?

column3:
うーむ…西に向かうか東をめざすか
悩める男 ダエトール…
まっボクは方向音痴だから
西も東もよくわからないんだけどね！
column4:
Hmm... Should I head west or east?
A troubling dilemma... Wait a moment...

I just remembered I have no sense of
direction, so it doesn't matter which
way I go.

column3:
今日も悩むダエトール…
西に向かうか東へ向かうか…
column4:
There's no decision to be made here.
East or west—it's all the same to me!

column3: うーん…ただただ怖かったです
column4: Phew... That was a terrifying dilemma!

column3: うーん…冷や汗すごいです
column4:
Ugh... I'm totally dripping with a cold
sweat after that!

column3: うーん…まだドキドキしてる
column4:
Phew... My heart's beating a mile
a minute.

column3: うーん…さっきの魔物が今夜の夢に出そう
column4:
Brrrr... Those monsters are definitely
going to make an appearance in my 
dreams. Will you rock me to sleep?

column3: めちゃくちゃ恐ろしかったよー
column4:
That was...
So scary...

column3: ああ生きてるー！奇跡だー！
column4:
Huh? I'm... I'm alive?!
It's a miracle!

column3: あ これ助けてくれたお礼ね
column4:
Here, take this. For helping me out
of that dilemma.
